posts.post_title: WTB: Davis, Duffy, Joss, and Lajoie T206's
posts.post_content:
I'm looking to get gifts for my baseball coaches and am looking for the following in poor to fair condition:

George Davis
Hugh Duffy
Addie Joss (Pitching)
Nap Lajoie (Throwing)

Please Pm me or email me at [url]trl@lclark.edu[/url] with scans and prices.

Thanks so much for all your help,

Tucker
